item.title: How An Airline Analogy Is Reframing The Cost Of Food
item.description: Imagine one in three flights flying empty. That’s food trucking today—where empty miles drive up food prices, costs and emissions.

item.title: HBO Is Making A Police Version Of ‘The Pitt,’ ‘American Blue
item.description: The Pitt has inspired HBO to make another series in that vein, this time a cop series called American Blue starring a big actor.

item.title: ‘Bridgerton’ Season 4 Has The Lowest Audience Score Of The Series
item.description: Bridgerton season 4 is here, but audience seems less thrilled about it than past seasons so far, as it has the series' lowest Rotten Tomatoes audience...
